Uses of Package
com.k2.Wiget

  • Packages that use com.k2.Wiget 
    Package Description
    com.k2.Wiget  
    com.k2.Wiget.templateFactory  
    com.k2.Wiget.templateFactory.impl  
    com.k2.Wiget.templateFactory.spec  
    com.k2.Wiget.testAssemblies.impl

    com.k2.Wiget.testWigets.spec  
  • Classes in com.k2.Wiget used by com.k2.Wiget 
    Class and Description
    AssembledWiget
    Am assembled wiget represents a wiget within an assembly of wigets Assembled wigets can set values for the wigets parameters and if set they will override the parameter values derived from the wigets typed data source.
    ContainedWiget
    The contained wiget interface groups together assembled wigets and container bindings under a single type thus allowing them both to be included in a single list.
    Wiget
    The wiget interface defines the methods common to all wigets
    WigetAssembly
    A wiget assmbly is an hierarchy of assembled wigets.
    WigetContainer
    A wiget container identifies a container of a wiget.
    WigetFactory
    A wiget factory supplied implementations of wigets requested by their implementing interfaces or wiget alias.
    WigetFamily
    A wiget family groups together wigets that are designed to work together and as such in the absence of other restrictions all wigets within a family can be contained with other wigets of the same family, however they cannot be contained and cannot contain wigets from another family.
    WigetParameter
    This abstract class is the base class of all wiget parameters implementations Wiget parameters extend the K2ParameterExpression class and implement the K2Expression interface and as such cam be used in expression and predicate definitions with a suitable evaluator the WigetParameterEvaluator
    WigetParameterEvaluator
    This interface identifies those classes that can be used to evaluate a wiget parameter in the contect of an Expression or Predicate
  • Classes in com.k2.Wiget used by com.k2.Wiget.templateFactory 
    Class and Description
    AWiget
    The abstract wiget AWiget provides the basic structure for all wiget implementations.
    Wiget
    The wiget interface defines the methods common to all wigets
    WigetAssembly
    A wiget assmbly is an hierarchy of assembled wigets.
    WigetFactory
    A wiget factory supplied implementations of wigets requested by their implementing interfaces or wiget alias.
    WigetFamily
    A wiget family groups together wigets that are designed to work together and as such in the absence of other restrictions all wigets within a family can be contained with other wigets of the same family, however they cannot be contained and cannot contain wigets from another family.
